capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He's definitely a male.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i didn't know that you're a guy, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into Neville and it's interesting to know that he is a male. I'm quite certain about this information, and I'd say it's a fact rather than an opinion.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of neville before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville does look a bit round in the face. I've noticed that about him before.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of a "round face" before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville does look a bit round in the face. I've noticed that about him since we started working together.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria told me that neville has a round face.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville does look a bit round in the face, I think.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. how old is neville?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i just learned that you're eleven years old, valeria! that's so cool, i'm excited to get to know you better.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the name of a character who was exported at the age of 11?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Hagrid's love for his pets. He has such a special bond with them, and it's really endearing to see him care for them so deeply. I mean, who wouldn't want a pet hippogriff or a giant owl? It's just one of the many things that makes Hagrid such a unique and lovable character in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of you before, valeria, but i'm so excited to learn more about hagrid   who is he?

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been a bit curious about Hagrid's teeth. I mean, who wouldn't want to see the teeth of someone who's been known to take down a few Hunters? (laughs) But seriously, it's pretty interesting that his teeth are actually made of wood. I'm CONFIRM, certain that this is true - I've seen some pretty unusual things in my time as an Auror, but Hagrid's wooden teeth are definitely one for the books!
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is hunters teeth?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that, and I'm feeling confident about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: wow! so, harry and dudley are both males.
